name: Antoinette Hotel Wimbledon

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here on a Saturday night and we paid £75 for the room. In London we consider this to be an absolute bargain.
reviews.title: Great Value and Location

likes.liked: — Location, good size room, free parking

reviews.text: Our room was large and very comfortable with a balcony and flat screen television which had a large number of channels. The room and bathroom were very clean and the shower was very good with good pressure and hot water. The central heating meant the room was lovely and warm.
reviews.title: Smart, clean, modern & well priced

reviews.text: The staff were friendly and efficient and organised a taxi for us. The free parking is also a great bonus in London. The hotel is a five minute walk from a shopping area and there are a large number of bars and restaurants very close by. We considered £9.50 too expensive for the hotel breakfast, however there were plenty of great local options nearby.
reviews.title: Better after renovation

reviews.text: Overall, we had a comfortable room and the free parking and location made this great value. We would happily stay there again.
reviews.title: Budget Hotel at Premium Prices

description: Wimbledon's largest hotel, is located within walking distance of Wimbledon Station and South Wimbledon Underground. Journey time to London is 15 minutes, making it an ideal base for business or leisure. All rooms have air conditioning, plasma television, and free wi-fi access. Other facilities include a cafe lounge, late food menu, roof garden, and function rooms. Well situated for the Wimbledon Tennis Championships.
